title: The sales. 05.10-05.13.
body: I have a question. There is the Champion and Skin sale from **05. 10.** to** 05. 13.** But it's until _**05.13. 23:59**_? Or how? I just simply don't know that. Please help me.

replies.body: Double checked these specific sales and they're intended to last until 23:59 on May 13.  Generally speaking, our standard skin/champion sales will last throughout the entire day (i.e. ending at 23:59 on the stated date).  Some specific sales may start/end earlier, but that's on a case by case basis and we usually  will state if it's going to be different.
